title: Hierarchical Clustering Dendrogram
description: In this lab, we will learn how to plot the corresponding dendrogram of a hierarchical clustering using AgglomerativeClustering and the dendrogram method available in scipy.

meta.title: Hierarchical Clustering Dendrogram | Data Science Tutorial
meta.description: Learn how to plot the corresponding dendrogram of a hierarchical clustering using AgglomerativeClustering and the dendrogram method in Python.
meta.keywords: hierarchical clustering, dendrogram, data science, machine learning, python
